TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CodeDomSerializerBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 類別的基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用做為共用的基底之間和類別。The class is used as a shared base between the and classes. 公用類別衍生自類別。Public classes derive from the class. 每個公用類別定義自己的公用 API。Each public class defines its own public API. 類別定義任何公用 API，但是也提供許多公用程式方法，可用來協助序列化程序。The class defines no public API, but does offer a multitude of utility methods that can be used to aid the serialization process.

protected: System::Object ^ DeserializeExpression(System::ComponentModel::Design::Serialization::IDesignerSerializationManager ^ manager, System::String ^ name, System::CodeDom::CodeExpression ^ expression);

span.span: The to use for serialization.

param.name: name
param.span: 運算式產生的物件名稱。

span.span: The name of the object that results from the expression.

param.span: 如果不需要命名該物件，則可為 。

span.span: Can be if there is no need to name the object.
The to interpret.

summary.span: 將指定的運算式還原序列化為記憶體中物件。

span.span: Deserializes the given expression into an in-memory object.
An object resulting from interpretation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是 helper 方法，衍生類別可以還原序列化運算式呼叫。This is a helper method that derived classes can call to deserialize an expression. 還原序列化解譯及執行所指定的 CodeDOM 運算式陳述式`expression`參數，然後傳回結果。It deserializes the statement by interpreting and executing the CodeDOM expression specified by the `expression` parameter, and then returns the results. 如果物件必須先建立這個運算式的結果，會授與它所指定的名稱`name`參數。If an object needs to be created as a result of this expression, it will be given the name specified by the `name` parameter. 名稱可以是`null`如果不需要命名的物件。The name can be `null` if there is no need to name the object. 下表描述如何指定運算式的處理。The following table describes how specific expressions are handled. |運算式Expression|行為Behavior| |----------------|--------------| ||這個運算式表示`this`或`Me`。This expression represents `this` or `Me`. 找不到這個運算式中，與相關聯物件方法將會尋找內容堆疊中針對。To locate the object that is associated with this expression, the method will look in the context stack for a . 此物件包含圖形和運算式，表示它的根物件。This object contains the root object of the graph and the expression that represents it. 如果物件存在，並且運算式比對，就會傳回根物件。If the object is present and the expression matches, the root object will be returned. 如果找不到執行個體，則會報告錯誤。An error is reported if an instance cannot be located.| ||如果欄位參考的目標評估為根物件，的管理員參數的方法將會用來擷取以名稱為基礎的物件執行個體。If the target of the field reference evaluates to the root object, the method of the manager parameter will be used to retrieve the object instance based on name. 否則，一般使用反映對目標物件找不到要求的欄位。Otherwise, standard reflection is used against the target object to locate the requested field. 如果找不到欄位，會報告錯誤。An error is reported if the field cannot be located.| ||方法`manager`參數用來找出此執行個體表示指定的變數名稱。The method of the `manager` parameter is used to locate the instance representing the given variable name. 如果找不到執行個體，則會報告錯誤。An error is reported if an instance cannot be located.| 會繼續解譯運算式，直到它們完全解析至物件，或直到它不再可以簡化的運算式。 continues to interpret expressions until they are completely resolved to an object, or until it can no longer simplify the expression. 在此情況下，會傳回，其中包含最簡化的運算式。In this case, will return a that contains the most simplified expression. 不支援下列運算式：The following expressions are not supported: - - -

An instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得物件的執行個體還原序列化期間叫用方法。The method is invoked during deserialization to obtain an instance of an object. 此呼叫時，應該會傳回所要求類型的執行個體。When this is called, an instance of the requested type should be returned. 預設實作會叫用方法`manager`參數。The default implementation invokes the method of the `manager` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void DeserializePropertiesFromResources (System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager manager, object value, Attribute[] filter);

.method familyhidebysig instance void DeserializePropertiesFromResources(class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager manager, object value, class System.Attribute[] filter) cil managed
Protected Sub DeserializePropertiesFromResources (manager As IDesignerSerializationManager, value As Object, filter As Attribute())
protected: void DeserializePropertiesFromResources(System::ComponentModel::Design::Serialization::IDesignerSerializationManager ^ manager, System::Object ^ value, cli::array <Attribute ^> ^ filter);

span.span: The to use for serialization.

param.name: value
param.span: 要還原序列化其屬性的物件。

span.span: The object from which the properties are to be deserialized.

param.name: filter
param.span: 篩選要還原序列化之屬性的 陣列。

span.span: An array that filters which properties will be deserialized.

summary.span: 從不因文化特性而異的資源配套還原序列化指定物件上的屬性。

span.span: Deserializes properties on the given object from the invariant culture’s resource bundle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在衍生類別的 helper 方法可以呼叫。The method is a helper method that derived classes can call. 它會尋找指定的物件上的屬性，並嘗試載入它們的值，不因文化特性而異的資源配套。It looks for properties on the given object and attempts to load their values out of the invariant culture’s resource bundle. 這通常用來處理不會發出至原始碼的設計階段屬性。This is generally used to handle design-time properties that are not emitted into source code. 它應該不會用於當地語系化屬性因為它只作用於文化特性而異。It should not be used for localized properties because it only operates on the invariant culture. 這個方法會檢查所有的屬性`value`參數符合指定的屬性`filter`參數，然後檢查這些資源的二進位物件中的屬性。This method inspects all of the properties of the `value` parameter that match the attributes specified by the `filter` parameter, and then checks for those properties in a resource binary object. 這可用於無法在程式碼，例如設計階段屬性中的還原序列化屬性。This is useful for deserializing properties that cannot be represented in code, such as design-time properties. 此方法需要設計工具載入器提供讀取資源。This method requires that a designer loader offers an to read resources. 如果提供的文化特性而異，然後會讀取 XML 資源 (.resx) 檔案的中繼資料區段不會包含在最終編譯的程式碼資源。If the provides a for the invariant culture, then will read resources from the XML resource (.resx) file’s metadata section, which is not included in final compiled code. 如果此服務無法使用，將會不讀取任何資源。If this service is not available, no resources will be read.

span.span: The to use for serialization.

param.name: value
param.span: 要為其取得運算式的物件。

span.span: The object for which to get an expression.

summary.span: 傳回指定物件的運算式。

span.span: Returns an expression for the given object.

returns.span: 表示 ，或表示 (如果沒有 的現有運算式)。

span.span: A representing , or if there is no existing expression for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回代表指定之物件的運算式。The method returns an expression representing the given object. 它可以傳回`null`，這表示，沒有運算式已設定之描述的物件。It can return `null`, indicating that no expression has been set that describes the object. 運算式會取得在三種方式之一：Expressions are acquired in one of three ways: - 運算式可能在先前呼叫的結果方法。The expression could be the result of a prior call to the method. - 運算式無法中已找到。The expression could have been found in the . - 運算式無法衍生透過。The expression could be derived through . 若要衍生透過運算式、方法查詢參考服務中的指定物件的名稱。To derive expressions through , the method queries the reference service for a name for the given object. 如果運算式服務傳回有效的名稱， 、方法會檢查是否有"。"的名稱。If the expression service returns a valid name, , the method checks to see if there is a "." in the name. 這表示運算式服務找到此物件的唯讀屬性的傳回值為另一個物件。This indicates that the expression service found this object as the return value of a read-only property on another object. 如果沒有"。"，會分割成組件的參考。If there is a ".", will split the reference into parts. 最左邊的部分是要評估與名稱方法。The leftmost part is a name that will be evaluated with the method. 對於每個後續的部分，將建置屬性參考運算式。For each subsequent part, a property reference expression will be built. 最終的運算式，則會傳回。The final expression will then be returned. 如果物件沒有運算式設定，或是在參考的服務中，找不到物件會傳回`null`，指出物件沒有現有的運算式。If the object did not have an expression set, or if the object was not found in the reference service, will return `null`, indicating there is no existing expression for the object.

span.span: is .

span.span: Locates a serializer for the given object value.
A that is appropriate for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是擴充功能方法。The method is an extension to the method. 方法會採用物件類型，而非物件值。The method takes an object type, rather than an object value. 如果外部合作對象已覆寫透過特定物件的中繼資料，該中繼資料覆寫會無法看到方法，只接受型別。If an external party had overridden metadata for a specific object through , that metadata override would not be seen by the method, which only takes a type. 方法會檢查中繼資料值和值的類型。The method checks the metadata of the value and the value’s type. 如果兩個不同，會查看是否有自訂設計工具的序列化程式屬性的值。If the two differ, will look to see if there is a custom designer serializer attribute on the value. 如果是這樣，會優先使用它。If so, will attempt to use it. 否則，它會由。Otherwise, it will defer to .

span.span: or is .

A unique name for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫 方法。The method calls the method. 如果此方法不會傳回一個名稱，然後使用来由此物件的有效名稱。If this method does not return a name, then uses to fabricate a valid name for the object. 如果服務無法使用，將由此根據 short 型別名稱結合的索引編號，使它成為唯一的名稱。If the service is not available, will fabricate a name based on the short type name combined with an index number to make it unique. 產生的名稱是藉由呼叫相關聯的序列化管理員方法之前會傳回新的名稱。The resulting name is associated with the serialization manager by calling the method before the new name is returned.

span.span: or is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生類別的 helper 方法可加以呼叫來序列化成單一事件的方法是指定。The method is a helper method that derived classes can call to serialize a single event into the given . 查詢的序列化管理員所指定的事件，並詢問序列化它。 queries the serialization manager for a for the given event, and then asks the to serialize it. 將`statements`和`descriptor`參數。 places the `statements` and `descriptor` parameters on the . 需要探索事件繫結至未編譯的方法。 requires an to discover event bindings to methods that are not compiled. 如果此服務不存在，將不會寫入事件繫結至未編譯的方法。If this service is not present, event bindings to non-compiled methods will not be written. 如果要將事件繫結的物件可以轉換為運算式，仍會序列化事件繫結至已編譯的方法。Event bindings to compiled methods will still be serialized if the objects to which the events are bound can be converted into expressions.

span.span: Serializes the properties on the given object into the invariant culture’s resource bundle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在衍生類別的 helper 方法可以呼叫。The method is a helper method that derived classes can call. 它會查看屬性`value`參數，它符合`filter`參數，然後將內容序列化至的文化特性而異的資源配套。It looks at properties on the `value` parameter that match the `filter` parameter, and then it serializes the properties into the invariant culture resource bundle. 如果資源服務傳回，屬性值會儲存在中繼資料區段的 XML 資源 (.resx) 檔。If the resource service returns a , the property values will be stored in the metadata section of the XML resource (.resx) file. `statements`不使用參數。The `statements` parameter is not used. 若要序列化為資源，屬性必須是簡單 （而不是內容屬性），而且其值必須是可序列化。To be serialized as a resource, a property must be simple (not a content property) and its value must be serializable. 將略過不符合此模式的屬性。Properties that do not conform to this pattern will be skipped. 需要取得寫入而異的文化特性的資源。 requires an to obtain a to write resources for the invariant culture. 如果此服務無法使用，則會不寫入任何資源。If this service is not available, no resources will be written.

span.span: , , or is .

Protected Sub SerializeResource (manager As IDesignerSerializationManager, resourceName As String, value As Object)
protected: void SerializeResource(System::ComponentModel::Design::Serialization::IDesignerSerializationManager ^ manager, System::String ^ resourceName, System::Object ^ value);

span.span: The to use for serialization.

param.name: resourceName
param.span: 要序列化 value 的資源配套名稱。

span.span: The name of the resource bundle into which value will be serialized.
The object to serialize.

summary.span: 將指定的物件序列化為使用指定資源名稱的資源配套。

span.span: Serializes the given object into a resource bundle using the given resource name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，會將序列化值，以指定的名稱下的資源配套。The method is a helper method that serializes a value to a resource bundle under the given name. 寫入資源的文化特性由搜尋序列化管理員的集合中的之屬性呼叫`ResourceCulture`。The culture that the resource is written to is determined by searching the serialization manager’s collection for a property called `ResourceCulture`. 如果這個屬性存在，會將資源寫入該文化特性。If this property exists, resources will be written to that culture. 否則，會將資源寫入文化特性而異。Otherwise, resources will be written to the invariant culture. `value`參數必須是可序列化。The `value` parameter must be serializable. 需要取得寫入正確的文化特性的資源。 requires an to obtain a to write resources for the correct culture. 如果此服務無法使用，會改為建立代表資源的程式碼中的二進位物件。If this service is not available, will instead build a binary object in code that represents the resource.

para.span: 是讀寫屬性，透過序列化管理員的存取集合。

span.span: is a read-write property that is accessed through the serialization manager’s collection.

para.span: 方法永遠不會變更這個屬性的值; 它只會讀取該識別則會寫入的文化特性。

span.span: The method never changes the value of this property; it merely reads it to identify the culture to which it will write.

para.span: 在還原序列化期間設定的屬性，因為會剖析和載入資源。

span.span: The property is set during deserialization as resources are parsed and loaded.

The object to serialize.

span.span: Serializes the given object into a resource bundle using the given resource name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源就一定會寫入到文化特性而異。The resource is always written to the invariant culture. `value`參數必須是可序列化。The `value` parameter must be serializable. 方法需要取得寫入正確的文化特性的資源。The method requires an to obtain a to write resources for the correct culture. 如果此服務無法使用，會改為建立代表資源的程式碼中的二進位物件。If this service is not available, will instead build a binary object in code that represents the resource.

protected: System::CodeDom::CodeExpression ^ SerializeToExpression(System::ComponentModel::Design::Serialization::IDesignerSerializationManager ^ manager, System::Object ^ value);

span.span: The to use for serialization.
The object to serialize.
Can be .

summary.span: 將指定的物件序列化為運算式。

span.span: Serializes the given object into an expression.

returns.span: 如果可以序列化 則為 物件，否則為 。

span.span: A object if can be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`參數可以是`null`，在此情況下會傳回原始的運算式。The `value` parameter can be `null`, in which case a primitive expression will be returned. 方法會序列化型別使用下列規則：The method uses the following rules for serializing types: 1. 它會先呼叫若要查看運算式是否已建立物件的方法。It first calls the method to see if an expression has already been created for the object. 如果是的話，它會傳回現有的運算式。If so, it returns the existing expression. 2. 然後，找出物件的序列化程式，並讓其進行序列化。It then locates the object’s serializer, and asks it to serialize. 3. 如果物件的序列化程式傳回值是，則會傳回運算式。If the return value of the object’s serializer is a , the expression is returned. 4. 它會呼叫最後一個以查看是否序列化程式新增運算式。It makes one last call to to see if the serializer added an expression. 5. 最後，它會傳回`null`。Finally, it returns `null`. 如果無法建立沒有運算式，而且找不到任何適合的序列化程式，則會報告錯誤，透過序列化管理員。If no expression could be created and no suitable serializer could be found, an error will be reported through the serialization manager. 如果找不到序列化程式，但它無法產生運算式，將會不報告任何錯誤。No error will be reported if a serializer was found but it failed to produce an expression. 在此情況下，它會假設序列化程式已報告錯誤，或是它未嘗試序列化物件。In this case, it is assumed that the serializer either already reported the error or it did not attempt to serialize the object. 如果序列化程式傳回的陳述式或陳述式集合，這些陳述式不會被捨棄。If the serializer returned a statement or a collection of statements, those statements will not be discarded. 方法將會先尋找內容堆疊，並將陳述式加入至陳述式內容物件屬性。The method will first look for a on the context stack and add statements to the statement context object's property. 如果沒有陳述式內容，方法將會尋找的內容中然後加入那里的陳述式。If there is no statement context, the method will look in the context for a and add the statements there. 如果沒有地方可以找到加入陳述式，將會產生錯誤。If no place can be found to add the statements, an error will be generated. > [!NOTE] > 您不應該呼叫方法內當您將自己的物件。You should not call the method within when serializing your own object. 相反地，您應該呼叫。Instead, you should call . 如果它傳回`null`，建立您自己的運算式和呼叫。If it returns `null`, create your own expression and call . 然後繼續進行其餘部分的序列化。Then proceed with the rest of your serialization.

summary.span: 將物件序列化為運算式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，會將序列化資源運算式的值。The method is a helper method that serializes a value to a resource expression. 這是相對於方法，將值寫入資源二進位物件。This is in contrast to the method, which writes a value to a resource binary object. 進一步移一個步驟，並傳回可用於復原之資源的運算式。 goes one step further and returns an expression that can be used to recover the resource. 例如，傳回的值可能是 「 rm。GetValue("SomeBitmap");"。For example, the return value might be "rm.GetValue("SomeBitmap");". 資源的名稱會計算從，如果找到一個內容堆疊上。The name of the resource is calculated from the , if one can be found on the context stack. 方法將會尋找下列物件：The method will look on the for the following objects: - — 若要加入資源管理員，如果您需要將宣告陳述式集合。—a collection of statements to add a resource manager to, if one needs to be declared. - — 根運算式，但需要建立資源管理員。—the root expression, which is needed to create a resource manager. - — 用來製造資源的名稱，以及決定何種類型的資源管理員呼叫進行。—used to fabricate a name for the resource and to decide what type of resource manager call to make.

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ensureInvariant`參數是`true`、方法將也寫入資源值而異的文化特性資源檔如果目前`ResourceCulture`不是文化特性而異...If the `ensureInvariant` parameter is `true`, the method will also write the resource value into the invariant culture’s resource file if the current `ResourceCulture` is not the invariant culture..

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法相關聯的的物件。The method is a helper method that associates a with an object. 與這種方式中的運算式相關聯的物件都是可透過存取方法。Objects that have been associated with expressions in this way are accessible through the method. 內容堆疊上的附加物件以儲存其運算式的資料表，因此也可存取的任何序列化方法。 stores its expression table as an appended object on the context stack so it is accessible by any serializer’s method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法相關聯的的物件。The method is a helper method that associates a with an object. 與這種方式中的運算式相關聯的物件都是可透過存取方法。Objects that have been associated with expressions in this way are accessible through the method. 附加物件內容堆疊上以儲存其運算式的資料表，因此也可存取的任何序列化方法。The stores its expression table as an appended object on the context stack so it is accessible by any serializer’s method.
